summary: This release brings a beautiful new tree logo with a midnight mode easter egg, enhances your blog's glassmorphism design, and introduces customizable accent colors in the admin panel. We've centralized tier configuration for clearer plans, added a dynamic navigation toggle for pages, and strengthened security across the platform. Overall, version 0.9.4 polishes the visual experience and lays a more stable foundation with thoughtful refinements.

features: enhance blog glass design and vine editing UX (#306)
New tree logo and midnight mode easter egg (#312)
add accent color customization to admin settings
centralize tier configuration into single source of truth
add Philosophy, Design, and Developer categories (#310)
organize technical specs into workshop-style categories (#309)
add dynamic navigation toggle for pages
add Menu/Gallery nav links and fix page TOC extraction
fixes: restore Header/Footer logo behaviors and set default rotation to 0
remove deprecated Logo props from forest and vineyard pages
remove deprecated animate/color props from roadmap
map monochromeColor to accentColor for GlassLogo
update GroveDivider props for new Logo API
update imports and remove deprecated breathing prop
